<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rough Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=45) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 48 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are especially good at riding traditional goblin mounts. You gain the [Ride](/Feats.aspx?ID=835) feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks to use [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) on a [goblin dog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=236) or [wolf](/Monsters.aspx?ID=415) mount. You can always select a [wolf](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=8) as your animal companion, even if you would usually select an animal companion with the mount special ability, such as for a [champion's steed ally](/Classes.aspx?ID=4).
name: Rough Rider
